LargeOni.name: Manhunter
LargeOni.description: A large Oni with the body of a spider and the head of a lion, they are highly feared ny the villagers. With their sickle-shaped claws, they can cut through just about anything. Amongst the larger Oni, that having killing one the mark of a worthy Slayer.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Fire Elemental Resistances: Water

LargeOni.name: Bloodhunter
LargeOni.description: An Oni that has come from the deepest depths, they look like Manhunters but have a sheer white outer shell. Their claws are even larger, and appear red as if they have been dipped in blood. They are thought to be a variant of a Manhunter that has devoured multiple souls.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Wind Elemental Resistances: Earth

LargeOni.name: Windshredder
LargeOni.description: Windshredder has a lion (or wolf) like appearance, he has 2 large horns on his head, and he has white hair with some lines of yellow hair on his head. His face is blue with red eyes, Shredder has big teeth which he uses to hunt his prey and to eat. He's a quadrupedal demon and his fur is mostly golden with some marks around him, on each of his legs he has some kind of spiky object. Shredder has 3 claws on each foot. One thing that stands out of this fierce lion is his club-like tail which he can use to stun enemies or beat them to death.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Wind

LargeOni.name: Skyshredder
LargeOni.description: An Oni with claws so sharp that thy are capable of slicing through any material like it was the very sky itself. It is thought that they are Windshredders who have gained even more power by consuming so many souls. The massiv rampage houses the power of the skies, which is how they obtained their name.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: None Elemental Resistances: Sky

LargeOni.name: Jollux
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Wind Elemental Resistances: Earth

LargeOni.name: Edax
LargeOni.description: A large demon boasting a body like that of mountain. It is highly intelligent and has been reported to use sly or cunning tactics. Its attacks making use of its overwhelming size make it a dangerous threat. If hit squarely with its rushes or charges, it is sure to crush bones.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Fire Elemental Resistances: Water

LargeOni.name: Pyropteryx
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Water Elemental Resistances: Fire

LargeOni.name: Astrapteryx
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Wind

LargeOni.name: Terragrinder
LargeOni.description: Terragrinder (ツチカヅキ or 土潜, Tsuchigazuki) is a giant demon that can first be fought in chapter 3. Named after its natural habits, the demon digs with its large fins and slides across the earth as though it were water.
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Wind, Fire Elemental Resistances: Earth, Water

LargeOni.name: Pyrogrinder
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Water Wind Elemental Resistances: Fire

LargeOni.name: Harrowhalf
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Sky Elemental Resistances: Fire Water

LargeOni.name: Dreadhalf
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Sky |Left Arms: Earth |Right Arms: Wind Elemental Resistances: Earth, Wind

LargeOni.name: Viper Queen
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Water

LargeOni.name: Venom Queen
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Wind

LargeOni.name: Bladewing
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Wind Elemental Resistances: Earth

LargeOni.name: Frostwing
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Fire Elemental Resistances: Water

LargeOni.name: Chthonian Fiend
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Water, Wind Elemental Resistances: Fire

LargeOni.name: Abyssal Fiend
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Sky, Wind

LargeOni.name: Hell´s Warden
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth, Fire Elemental Resistances: Water, Wind

LargeOni.name: Hell´s Sentinel
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Water Elemental Resistances: Sky, Fire

LargeOni.name: Nightblade
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Sky, Wind

LargeOni.name: Sableblade
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Sky, Wind, Earth Elemental Resistances: Fire, Water

LargeOni.name: Cimmerian King
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Water Elemental Resistances: Sky, Fire

LargeOni.name: Amaranthine King
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Earth Elemental Resistances: Sky, Wind

LargeOni.name: Cerberus
LargeOni.advDescription: Elemental Weaknesses: Elemental Resistances:
